docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THEY DEFY GRAVITY. THEY ENCROACH on plastic surgeons. They bring muscle beach to the boudoir. Firming creams are the latest lure from the cosmetics industry, and their range is ambitious. They promise to transform eyelids, throat, bust, thighs and buttocks into expanses as bright and resilient as a trampoline.
